languages.text: "Разумеется. Что бы еще это могло быть..." {n}Дознаватель смущенно умолкает.{/n} "Видимо, формат приглашения был несколько... неподходящим, так ведь?"

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется. Что бы еще это могло быть..." {n}Дознаватель смущенно умолкает.{/n} "Видимо, формат приглашения был несколько... неподходящим, так ведь?"

languages.text: "Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется. Что бы еще это могло быть..." {n}Дознаватель смущенно умолкает.{/n} "Видимо, формат приглашения был несколько... неподходящим, так ведь?"

traits.locale_text: "Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."
"Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."
"Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."
"Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."

languages.text: “当然了，不然还能是什么呢……？”{n}海因里希尴尬地沉默了一会儿。{/n}“我猜，我的邀请听起来可能有点……不成体统。”
languages.original_text: "Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."

traits.locale_text: “当然了，不然还能是什么呢……？”{n}海因里希尴尬地沉默了一会儿。{/n}“我猜，我的邀请听起来可能有点……不成体统。”

languages.text: «Claro. ¿Qué iba a ser si no...?». {n}El interrogador guarda un avergonzado silencio.{/n} «Supongo que el formato de la invitación era un tanto... inadecuado».
languages.original_text: "Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."

traits.locale_text: «Claro. ¿Qué iba a ser si no...?». {n}El interrogador guarda un avergonzado silencio.{/n} «Supongo que el formato de la invitación era un tanto... inadecuado».

languages.text: 「当然だ。それ以外に何が…？」{n}インテロゲイターは照れくさそうに沈黙する。 {/n}「招待状の形式が少し…不釣り合いだっただろうか」
languages.original_text: "Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."

traits.locale_text: 「当然だ。それ以外に何が…？」{n}インテロゲイターは照れくさそうに沈黙する。 {/n}「招待状の形式が少し…不釣り合いだっただろうか」

languages.text: « Évidemment. Quoi d'autre... ? » {n}L'interrogateur marque une pause, l'air embarrassé.{/n} « J'imagine que le format de l'invitation était légèrement... incongru. »
languages.original_text: "Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."

traits.locale_text: « Évidemment. Quoi d'autre... ? » {n}L'interrogateur marque une pause, l'air embarrassé.{/n} « J'imagine que le format de l'invitation était légèrement... incongru. »

languages.text: "Offensichtlich. Was soll das denn sonst sein?" {n}Der Interrogator verfällt in betretenes Schweigen.{/n} "Ich schätze, die Art der Einladung war leicht ... unpassend."
languages.original_text: "Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."

traits.locale_text: "Offensichtlich. Was soll das denn sonst sein?" {n}Der Interrogator verfällt in betretenes Schweigen.{/n} "Ich schätze, die Art der Einladung war leicht ... unpassend."

languages.text: "Herhâlde. Başka ne olabilir ki?.." {n}Sorgucu, utanarak sessizliğe bürünüyor.{/n} "Sanırım davetin şekli, bir miktar... Tuhaf oldu."
languages.original_text: "Obviously. What else would it be...?" {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I suppose the format of the invitation was slightly... incongruous."
